extDes.message: 一款开源的火币市场行情助手浏览器扩展程序

upsColorRed.description: The color of increase is red

upsColorGreen.description: The color of increase is green

clearCacheWarn.message: 清除缓存后会重置为默认自选，是否清除？
clearCacheWarn.description: After clearing the cache, it will reset to default optional. Do you want to clear it?

colCoin.description: The name of the Bitcoin type field for the custom column in the table

colUps.description: The name of the rise and fall field for the custom column in the table

colClose.description: The name of the latest price field for the custom column in the table

colLow.description: The name of the lowest price field for the custom column in the table

colHigh.description: The name of the highest price field for the custom column in the table

colOpen.description: The name of the opening price field for the custom column in the table

colVol.description: The name of the turnover field for the custom column in the table

colAmount.description: The name of the volume field for the custom column in the table

colCount.description: The name of the transaction pen numeric segment for the custom column in the table

colBadge.description: The name of the subscript field for the custom column in the table

colOperation.description: The name of the action field for the custom column in the table

resetWidths.description: Restores the default column width of the table

clearMsg.message: 清除成功, 下次打开生效
clearMsg.description: The purge was successful and will take effect next time it is opened
